error.incompatible-odd: The width and height must be both odd or both even.
error.incompatible-ratio: The aspect ratio is invalid, it is currently too tall or wide.

range.both: The width and height must be between {min} and {max}.
range.width: The width must be between {min} and {max}.
range.height: The height must be between {min} and {max}.

non-integer.both: The width and height must be integers.
non-integer.width: The width must be an integer.
non-integer.height: The height must be an integer.
